metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21311 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Adminer is an open-source database management in a single PHP file. Inadminer from version 4.0.0 and before 4.7.9 there is a server-side requestforgery vulnerability. Users of Adminer versions bundling all drivers (e.g.`adminer.php`) are affected. This is fixed in version 4.7.9.

criterions.comment: adminer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
